intro: Annotate spans that indicate the presence of conspiracy-related psycholinguistic markers. Use the five aspects below and follow the examples.

aspects.label: Actor
aspects.title: Actor
aspects.description: Who is allegedly responsible for plotting or orchestrating the scheme.

examples.text: They say the shadowy intelligence agencies control all media narratives.

aspects.label: Action
aspects.title: Action
aspects.description: What the actors are alleged to be doing (the plotting/covering up).

examples.text: The conglomerates are manipulating the numbers to hide the truth.

aspects.label: Effect
aspects.title: Effect
aspects.description: Consequences or outcomes attributed to the alleged scheme.

examples.text: This plan will silence dissent and scare people from asking questions.

aspects.label: Victim
aspects.title: Victim
aspects.description: Who is harmed or targeted by the alleged scheme.

examples.text: Ordinary citizens are the ones paying the price for their lies.

aspects.label: Evidence
aspects.title: Evidence
aspects.description: Anecdotes, ‘proof’, or purported signs used to justify the claim.

examples.text: Look at the leaked emails: it’s obvious there’s a cover-up.
